Synopsis: Okabe Rintarou lives in an Akihabara apartment with his friends, dubbed the "future gadget laboratory". One particular device, is a microwave that seemingly only turns objects put into it to green goo. Until the group discovers that the microwave holds another secret: it can manipulate time.
